title: "X-ray Experiments and Machine Learning Innovation Could Trim Years off Battery R&D"
excerpt: "An X-ray instrument at Berkeley Lab contributed to a battery study that used an innovative approach to machine learning to speed up the learning curve about a process that shortens the life of fast-charging lithium batteries."
